description:
Great coffee for the great outdoors. Leave the brewing gear at home and save time while enjoying the rich, full-bodied Flash Fuel coffee. All you have to do is add hot water and stir.

  • Blend of Canadian Heritage Roasting Company’s instant and micro-ground coffee, this adds a robust flavour not usually found in instant coffees
  • Micro-ground coffee will leave a little sediment in your cup, like with a French press
  • 10 x 3.5g poches of coffee, so plan accordingly, you wouldn’t want to be flipping a coin for who does and doesn’t get coffee on your last day on the trail
name: Canadian Heritage Roasting Co. Flash Fuel Organic Instant Coffee
